title: bronze 3 looking for duo...
body:
im looking for a duo patner for ranked bronze 4 - bronze 1 im currently bronze 3.... i play jungle top adc and support so if u need a duo partner add me in game :: igt  >  Junglejungle  add me if u need a duo partner

(*MUST HAVE DISCORD*) CHEERS

replies.body: i guess i'll send u a friend request on lol, although i only play on the evenings during school days. i'm a support main who can also play lux mid (and very little else since i need new champions). i'm bronze 1 in solo/duo.

> [{quoted}](name=checkeredartist,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=gOUjMioA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-23T21:03:25.672+0000)
>
> i guess i'll send u a friend request on lol, although i only play on the evenings during school days. i'm a support main who can also play lux mid (and very little else since i need new champions). i'm bronze 1 in solo/duo.

for u man i will lvl up my 5th account, bcoz this 1 is gold can't duo. that account is lvl9-10 

add me in that one as well DeliciousYogurt
man i could help u in climbing but my 3 low account got ban xD
